txt.en: This weapon clearly was crafted during the Second Age, but it has been broken and ruined. Nevertheless, it still shines with great beauty.\n\nPerhaps in the forges of Elrond Halfelven, it might be reforged.

'Alas, this was once a token of great power, but even here, this weapon is beyond repair.

'However, it was not a loss for you to come here, for there are relics that may be taken from it which may prove useful to you in the future.

'The remaining shards shall be put in a place of honour.'
You found a weapon of the Second Age, broken and ruined, but beautiful still. Perhaps it might be reforged....
Bring the broken weapon to Elrond in Rivendell
Elrond is in the Last Homely House in Rivendell, far from the Great River.\n\nYou should bring the broken weapon to Elrond and see if his smiths can reforge it.
